borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of Condition 2 to allow material amendments to the approved drawings of planning permission reference:: 2016/05511/FUL dated 22nd December 2016 for the "Demolition of the existing building; erection of a part one, part three storey building plus-basement building to provide 2 x one bedroom and 2 x two bedroom self-contained flats; formation of balconies and a roof terrace at first floor level; erection of an external staircase from basement to ground floor level; associated landscaping." The amendments sought are alterations to include additional of rooflights to the main roof level, alterations to the extension on top of the back addition, the installation of sun pipes adjacent to each lightwell at ground floor level and removal of chimney stack at roof level, installation of boiler flue pipes, raising the height of party wall, change the staircase design, minor internal alteration to the layout, provision of addition cycle storage space at ground floor level and addition of gates to front boundary wall facing Muster Road.
decision_conditions: Details drawings in section and elevatio
No extensions or other form of enlargeme
No othe plumbing, extract flues or pipes
No other use of flat roofs
